body.name: Hot Plate,Cusimax Portable Electric Hot Plate for Cooking,1500W Countertop Single Burner, Cast Iron Stove, Concealed Handle, Temperature Controls, Compatible for All Cookwares
features: UPGRADE MODEL & QUALITY METAL MATERIAL: Wheel-shaped knob, non-slip and anti-hot, concealed handle, easy to move.Stainless steel body constructed to withstand frequent use. Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool. The non-slip feet ensure that the unit stays firmly in place. Overheat protection and indicator light for safe use. Automatic safety shutoff function with temperature regulated by a thermostat, to avoid damage or injury.

1500W POWER & EASY TO CONTROL: CUSIMAX hot plate used thermostatically controlled heat settings conveniently to cook a variety of foods such as warm sauces, scrambled eggs, grilled cheese, soup, pasta, vegetables and so much more. Also you can use it as extra burner to keep food warm. It takes about 20 minutes for a hot plate to cool down, please do not touch the burner body when in use.

ALL TYPES OF COOKWARE: Our hot plate is equipped with a powerful 7.4 inches heating plate, compatible with pots and pans with maximum size of 7.4 inches. It can be used with any type of cookware in your home, such as aluminium pans, copper pans, cast lron frying pans and non-magnetic stainless steel pans can heats cookware efficiently with minimal heat loss.

MULTIPURPOSE & PORTABLE: It is ideal for office use, camping, parties, boats, RVs, student accommodation, traveling or as an extra cooking utensil in your kitchen. Because of its small and light size, you can easily to used in confined spaces or anywhere.

NOTICE: CUSIMAX offer a outstanding 30-day return policy & 18-month promisefor your worry-free customer experience. All CUSIMAX products are covered by Product Liability Insurance of United States. For details, please refer to the instruction manual. (Note: It is normal the machine will get hot because it has higher calorific value when it works. It’s normal that the heating light may cycle on and off during operation.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PORTABLE HOT PLATE Indispensable assistant in your kitchen Powered by 120V and 1500-Watts, this single burner heats quickly and evenly with minimal heat loss and saving energy. This Hot Plate is powerful enough to use as an additional solid burner to warm sauces, make soups, boil water, cook pasta and vegetables and do so much more, just as if it were a normal stove.The Portable Burner is equipped with thermostatically controlled heat settings for precise cooking. Simply turn the control knob to the desired position, it will maintain the steady temperature for your cuisine until the setting is changed.Simply turn the control knob to the desired position, it will maintain the steady temperature for your cuisine until the setting is changed.

Cusimax Electric Hot Plate Product Features Wheel-shaped Adjustable temperature control knob, non-slip and anti-hot, concealed handle, easy to moveHigh quality cast iron plate - pans or pots should be in diameter of 4-7.4 inchesWork with all types of cookware - metal, ceramic and etc.Thermal fuse for overheating protectionNo electromagnetic radiationNo noise

Temperature Control Setting Wheel-shaped Adjustable temperature control knob, non-slip and anti-hot.Cook a variety of foods such as warm sauces, boil water, scrambled eggs, grilled cheese, soup, pasta, vegetables and so much more.Simply turn the control knob to the desired position, it will maintain the steady temperature for your cuisine until the setting is changed. Upgraded Style and Materials Concealed Handle, easy to move.Stainless steel body constructed to withstand frequent use. Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool. The non-slip feet ensure that the unit stays firmly in place. Overheat protection and indicator light for safe use. Automatic safety shutoff function with temperature regulated by a thermostat, to avoid damage or injury. Durable Cast Iron Plates With powerful 1500W heating cast-iron plate cooks up food fast and evenly with minimal heat loss. High quality cast iron plate works well for pans or pots. Easy to Clean Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool. Black Stainless steel body built to withstand frequent use. *Never use harsh abrasives or caustic cleansers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent counter top element
reviews.reviewText: Works extremely well. Cooks better than the gas stove I had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cooktop unit
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cooktop unit as the kitchen I was in would heat up the whole house uncomfortably. The kit was located in the middle of the house with no vents or windows. This cooktop unit is great for me. It heats up fast and does not heat the room. Easy to cook on with dialing temp control. It uses all pan types. Takes a bit to cool down of course. Like this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the overall look and maybe because I’m used to cooking with gas this seems to take forever to heat up. I don’t like that you can’t visibly see if a burner is on. The old coil ones you could see they were red when in use. These are just black round discs that sort of look like rubber. Idk if other ( new versions) hot plates have burners that change color when in use or not but I would recommend the manufacturer include this feature in its design. Or even a light next to the burner in use. Other than that it looks nice and works well if your use to electric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars safe, easy and hot !
reviews.reviewText: I use this at work for soups, boiling water, espresso etc.. Very nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good compact hotplate
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased to get me through a kitchen remodel. The burners heat fast and are as efficient in heating and temp control as a full sized range. There is room enough to handle 2 pots of normal size used in cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The body is hot!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because I live in a trailer and I was looking for a way to cook more meals without taking the entire kitchen apart.It works really well, but the entire unit gets VERY hot! So it can't be moved while or right after one uses it.Since storage is a premium in my little trailer, it makes it difficult to "store" right after use.Other than the heat factor, it works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product has worked well for me in my small space. It is not too heavy, is easy to clean, and cooks evenly. I would have given another star if both burners functioned equally but the smaller burner does not cook as hot as the larger. Great for warming or something along those lines but not great to say prepare pasta while making sauce on the larger burner. It does however give an added dimension to meals I can prepare in my small space.
Buena cocina , ideal para empotrar y una potencia suficiente para uso diario la recomiendo 100%
I use this for cooking. It is safe and easy to clean. The cooking wares are protected without too high temperatures. The price is reasonable and the delivery is acceptable.

Nice looking, works great and takes little space. The only thing is the temperature switches warm up along with the whole thing a bit, they shouldve put them on the side somewhere..its a bit weird to be they so close to the stove

I dont have a stove in my apartment right now and this works pretty ok. The large burner was fine for a few weeks but heats much less than the small one. However the small burner gets as hot as I ever need and can warm large pans of water or stock. So overall it meets my needs. The dials on the front are awkward to use to be honest. Top of stove ones would be better

reviews.reviewTitle: Cusimax Hot Plate Electric Burner Double
reviews.reviewText: Works well takes awhile to heat up but other than that it works well.
